# name(forInputBus:)

**Instance Method**

Gets the name of the input bus you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
func name(forInputBus bus: AVAudioNodeBus) -> String?
```

## Parameters

- **bus**: The input bus from an audio node.

## Return Value

The name of the input bus.

## Configuring an Input Format Bus

- **AVAudioNodeBus**: The index of a bus on an audio node.
- **inputFormat(forBus:)**: Gets the input format for the bus you specify.
- **numberOfInputs**: The number of input busses for the node.
